text: enre janannale, ninnal ninnalute raksitavineat papameacanam tetuka. ennitt avankalekk khediccumatannukayum ceyyuka. enkil avan ninnalkk samrd'dhamayi mala ayaccutarikayum, ninnalute saktiyilekk avan kututal sakti certtutarikayum ceyyunnatanâ€Œ. ninnal kurravalikalayikkeant pintirinn peakarutâ€Œ
